name: Voxxe
description:
Every Reality starts with a dream. Each of us has the power to build whatever we imagine and fill the multiverse with our visions.

Voxxe is a game about creativity, drawing, building, sharing and remixing. In Voxxe, you can build your own Realities or Remix Realities you find exploring. Make and edit blocks with the Blockpack Editor and share them with friends!

Voxxe is a game designed to be played in a community. It is easy for everyone to get started, and if you're already a voxel or pixel enthusiast, you'll be happy to find a place where your creations will thrive!

Voxxe is a WebGL browser game. You can play its current 'open alpha' version by visiting the link below:

Play Voxxe in your browser right now! (Google Chrome on a Desktop)

Or if you prefer, we offer ready to run (no installation required) standalone versions for Windows / Mac/ Linux.

Features

  • Build voxel constructions called Realities
  • Allow people to visit them, leave comments, take photos, and even create new Realities by remixing yours
  • Create or edit custom blocks using the Blockpack Editor and use them as the building blocks of your creations
  • Share Realities and Blockpacks you made with the world, and watch as they inspire other's imagination
  • Show your love for Realities and Blockpacks you like with stars, comments and photos.
